about_the_game:
Barista demonstrates Ultraleap Hyperion's fiducial marker functionality, alongside the brand new "hand on object" tracking hint which improves hand tracking robustness when holding objects in your hand.

The experience guides you through the process of creating a coffee - grabbing a cup, filling with milk & coffee, applying a label, and serving to a customer.

Please ensure Ultraleap Hyperion has been launched before launching this DLC demo app!
detailed_description:
Barista demonstrates Ultraleap Hyperion's fiducial marker functionality, alongside the brand new "hand on object" tracking hint which improves hand tracking robustness when holding objects in your hand.

The experience guides you through the process of creating a coffee - grabbing a cup, filling with milk & coffee, applying a label, and serving to a customer.

Please ensure Ultraleap Hyperion has been launched before launching this DLC demo app!
name: Ultraleap Hyperion - Barista

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070, 1080, 2080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Hand tracking requires Ultraleap Gemini or Hyperion and a connected Ultraleap tracking camera
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Barista demonstrates Ultraleap Hyperion's fiducial marker functionality, alongside the brand new "hand on object" tracking hint which improves hand tracking robustness when holding objects in your hand.
